finishSfxId.Wiki: SfxID at the time of cancellation (-1: invalid)

finishSeId.Wiki: SeID at the time of release (-1: invalid)

camouflageBeginDist.Wiki: It is the camouflage start distance

camouflageEndDist.Wiki: It is the camouflage end distance

initDmyId.Wiki: Damipoli ID at the time of activation (-1: root)

finishDmyId.Wiki: Damipoli ID at the time of cancellation (-1: root)

soulParamIdForWepEnchant.Wiki: Soul Param ID for Weapon Enchantment (-1: None). Change the applied Phantom Param.

playCategory.Wiki: Controls effect playback due to duplicate effects

playPriority.Wiki: Set the playback priority when the categories match (lower one has priority)

existEffectForSoul.Wiki: Is there an effect for the soul body?

effectInvisibleAtCamouflage.Wiki: Whether to hide the effect when hiding

invisibleAtFriendCamouflage.Wiki: Is it hidden even by allies when hiding?

isHideFootEffect_forCamouflage.Wiki: Do you want to turn off the foot effect when hiding?

isFullBodyTransformProtectorId.Wiki: Is the transformation armor ID for the whole body?

isInvisibleWeapon.Wiki: Invisible Weapon for Weapon Enchantment (0: Weapon Show, 1: Weapon Hide)

isMidstFullbody.Wiki: Do you use whole body Damipoli for equipping SFX during effect? Play SFX from torso: 190, head: 191, hands: 192, legs: 193 at 1

isInitFullbody.Wiki: Do you use the whole body Damipoli for equipping SFX during activation? Play SFX from torso: 190, head: 191, hands: 192, legs: 193 at 1

isFinishFullbody.Wiki: Do you use the whole body Damipoli for equipping SFX at the time of release? Play SFX from torso: 190, head: 191, hands: 192, legs: 193 at 1

isVisibleDeadChr.Wiki: If , VFX will be displayed even when the corpse is dead.

isUseOffsetEnchantSfxSize.AltName: Use Enchant SFX Size to Offset SFX ID
isUseOffsetEnchantSfxSize.Wiki: Whether to offset the SfxId according to the enchantment Sfx size of the weapon para

footEffectPriority.Wiki: Foot effect offset priority (lower is higher)

footEffectOffset.Wiki: Amount offset to foot effect ID when this special effect is applied

traceSfxIdOffsetType.Wiki: The offset value applied to the sword flash SFX ID. Used for enchantment and sword trajectory effects

forceDeceasedType.Wiki: A function that can force the appearance of a character to be alive / dead

enchantStartDmyId_0.AltName: Enchant SFX Start - Dummy Poly ID [0]
enchantStartDmyId_0.Wiki: Damipoli ID generated at the base of enchantment

enchantEndDmyId_0.AltName: Enchant SFX end - Dummy Poly ID [0]
enchantEndDmyId_0.Wiki: Damipoli ID generated at the tip of the sword at the time of enchantment. -1 If specified, it will be automatically put out to the point where it is a serial number.

enchantStartDmyId_1.AltName: Enchant SFX Start - Dummy Poly ID [1]

phantomParamOverwriteType.Wiki: Forced overwrite type of phantom parameters

wetAspectType.Wiki: Generate a wet expression by referring to the wet parameter

materialParamId.Wiki: ID0-99 are GS reservation IDs. If ID100 or later is specified, the material extension parameter is referenced (-1: invalid value).

materialParamInitValue.Wiki: The value at the start of the fade of the material parameter. The target is specified by the material parameter ID. If the material parameter ID is -1, do nothing

materialParamTargetValue.Wiki: The value at the end of the fade of the material parameter. The target is specified by the material parameter ID. If the material parameter ID is -1, do nothing

materialParamFadeTime.Wiki: Fade time for material parameter values. Gradually reach the target value over this time. If the material parameter ID is -1, do nothing

footDecalMaterialOffsetOverwriteId.AltName: Foot Decal Material Offset Overwrite ID
footDecalMaterialOffsetOverwriteId.Wiki: Forcibly rewrite the floor material ID offset of the foot decal (-1 unused)

Self.Wiki: All Visual Effects for Special Effects
